data.title: Aghassi Sargsyan Age, Birthday, Zodiac Sign and Birth Chart
data.meta_description: Astrology details of Aghassi Sargsyan such as age, birthday, zodiac sign, and natal chart. Analyze their birth chart and kundli to understand their personality and cause of death through astrology.
data.text:
Aghassi Sargsyan was an Armenian economist and professor, known for his contributions to the field. He was born on February 11, 1938, and had a notable career in academia. His work and teachings have influenced various aspects of economic education and research in Armenia. Sargsyan's dedication to his profession and the impact he had on his students are remembered fondly after his passing in 2018.
